description: Copies the image within the same region or to a new region within the same AWS account. Note that any tags you added to the image will not be copied.

parameters.name: SourceImageName
parameters.description: The name of the image to copy.

parameters.name: DestinationImageName
parameters.description: The name that the image will have when it is copied to the destination.

parameters.name: DestinationRegion
parameters.description: The destination region to which the image will be copied. This parameter is required, even if you are copying an image within the same region.

nested_items.name: DestinationImageName
nested_items.description: The name of the destination image.
